title: Head Bolts (EJ)
body: Complex sequence. Refer to service manual.

title: EJ18
body:
Displacement: 1.8L
Aspiration: NA
Phase: Phase 1
Notes: US base Impreza early years; simple ECU

title: EJ22
body:
Displacement: 2.2L
Aspiration: NA
Phase: Phase 1/2
Notes: Common NA swap base; phase varies by year/market

title: EJ25D
body:
Displacement: 2.5L
Aspiration: NA
Phase: Phase 1
Notes: DOHC NA; phase 1 era wiring/sensors

title: EJ251
body:
Displacement: 2.5L
Aspiration: NA
Phase: Phase 2
Notes: Phase 2 NA; very swap-friendly

title: EJ253
body:
Displacement: 2.5L
Aspiration: NA
Phase: Phase 2
Notes: Late years can be DBW; some trims immobilizer

title: EJ205
body:
Displacement: 2.0L
Aspiration: Turbo
Phase: Phase 2
Notes: Best swap ECU era (no immobilizer, cable)

title: EJ255
body:
Displacement: 2.5L
Aspiration: Turbo
Phase: Phase 2
Notes: 3.70 FD era; DBW complicates swaps

title: EJ257
body:
Displacement: 2.5L
Aspiration: Turbo
Phase: Phase 2
Notes: STI engine; prefers STI 6MT

title: EJ20G
body:
Displacement: 2.0L
Aspiration: Turbo
Phase: Phase 1
Notes: Early JDM turbo; wiring differs

title: EJ20K
body:
Displacement: 2.0L
Aspiration: Turbo
Phase: Phase 2 transitional
Notes: Transitional era

title: EJ207
body:
Displacement: 2.0L
Aspiration: Turbo
Phase: Phase 2
Notes: Gold-standard JDM motor: AVCS, high rev, no immobilizer

title: EJ22T
body:
Displacement: 2.2L
Aspiration: Turbo
Phase: Phase 1
Notes: Limited special; included for completeness
